attributes.action: Bring back into service HMS Ark Royal, the Harriers and a Replacement for the Nimrod Maritime Patrol aircraft!
attributes.additional_details: Whilst most of us except that Cuts have to be made in Defence, the cuts have gone to far, leaving the Royal Navy without a capability to operate Fixed wing aircraft from Carriers and leaving the airforce without a Maritime Patrol capability leaves our Nation to vulnerable. This is highlighted in recent Operations in Libya, we are sending more vulnerable helicopters to do a job that the Harrier is ideal for. It is also a complete waste to think of all the tax payers money that has been ploughed into the Harrier GR9 and Nimrod projects, its just silly to throw them away!
